values: To alert someone is to tell or warn that person about something.
The fire alarm alerted us that there was a problem.
a.警觉，警惕的（to）；活泼的，敏捷的
vt. 使警觉，使意识到；警告
adj. 警惕的，警觉的；留心的
n. 警报；警戒，警惕ALERTabbr. Alcohol Level Evaluation Roadside Test 路边酒精浓度鉴定试验
时态:alerted, alerting, alerts
vt. 使警觉，使意识到；警告
